summary: Immersive low demand lighting effects, effective on low to high end systems and everything in between. Fully ELFX-ELE compatible.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5]Welcome to HyRFX [/size][size=3]- by Synyster
[/size][/font][/u][/b]

[size=4][u]TL;DR installation[/u]

1. Get "HyRFX-FullModule", unzip to \Skyrim directory (not \Data) 
2. Install Imaginator to \Data, 
3. Run game, adjust the Imaginator settings as below. 
DONE [/size]







[b][u]The Idea...[/u][/b]
In my time running Skyrim off a "non-uber" system I have experimented extensively with different post processing lighting systems.
It is a generally accepted fact within the modding community that SweetFX (all credits to CeeJay.dk for his incredible work) has a far lower demand on processers than ENB.
While other SweetFX pre-sets seem to have a fantasy look, HyRFX aims for an immersive feel.

[b][u]The Aim...[/u][/b]
The aim of this mod is to provide a realistic lighting system for the lowest possible drop in FPS.

[b][u][size=4]Requirements...[/size][/u][/b]
Only one mod is required for HyRFX to function. It is something most graphically minded mod users will likely already have, but if not:
Imaginator (by MyGoodEye and Gopher - with help from Vivanto and Deapri)
link: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13049/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13049/?[/url]

[b][u][size=4]Recommendations... [/size][/u][/b]
Dynavision - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12525/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12525/?[/url]
Dynavision static patch - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60097/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60097/?[/url]
SFO - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?[/url]
Purity - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65242/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65242/?[/url]
ELFX - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?[/url]

[b][u]Compatibility...[/u][/b]
To the best of my knowledge HyRFX is compatible with any mod as it is simply a post processor with no scripting or Skyrim/data changes.
I use in conjunction with ELFX for the best experience.

[b][u][size=5]Simple Installation... :)[/size]
[/u][/b]To install, just follow these quick steps:
1. Place the (entire) contents of the .rar within "\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim"". (not the data folder!)
2. Change your Imaginator MCM settings to the following (if you don't things are gonna look VERY strange)

[img]http://i.imgur.com/vng3ZgL.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/CRdZSEl.png[/img]
[b][u]Uninstalling...[/u][/b]
Remove all mod files from game folder. That's it! No scripts, no nonsense.

[b][u]Credits...[/u][/b]
SweetFX and shader suite by - CeeJay.dk 

[b][u]Permissions...
[/u][/b]Please don't re-upload, took me many hours of tweaking to get the desired effect with this preset.
I would recommend adjusting saturation and contrast in Imaginator for the desired effect rather than altering the SweetFX_settings. It gives you far smaller adjustment and more control. (I hope you dont need to!)

[b][u]About Me...[/u][/b]
Now the official stuff is out of the way, here's just a quick intro.
I'm a first year computer science student from England (studying in AUS) doing a little (basic) modding in my spare time to develop my skills. I hope you enjoy the mod.
author: Synyster
